name: DimensionTwist_DEMONIC
description:
I assure you that I really enjoyed tuning this model. As someone who loves horror from a young age, I didn't even know that I had been waiting all this time for a tool to appear that would allow me to bring my favorite fantasy beasts to life, but in a special way. The training was done in Dreambooth and used Dreamshaper_5BakedVae. The model was trained as a style, but I used filewords. This allowed me to have the following characters in one model: Demon, Werewolf, Minotaur, Zombie, Alien, Death, Ghost. The best thing about this principle is that you can "fuse" characters and get a unique result. For example, Demon is a separate character, but when you write Demonic Werewolf in the prompt, that's when magic happens. You can see examples of prompts in the pictures I'm sharing.

Trigger words for characters are, in addition to my beloved token ohwx, are the ones I used in filewords:

  • a minotaur with a horned head standing in a dark temple

  • a creepy looking zombie

  • a creepy looking cartoon zombie

  • a demon in a dark hall

  • a demonic looking monster

  • a werewolf, scary looking

  • a demonic werewolf, frightening, menacing look

  • a swamp zombie

  • a skeleton zombie

  • a creepy bald creature, scary looking

  • a sea monster

  • a forest demon

  • a demon alien

  • a demonic alien creature

  • creepy looking alien insect

  • a death

To make this treat even better, I added 0.15_rfktrsDarkdream_v10, and a pinch of rfktrsMysteryCreatures_v10.

You can see the successful fusion of my fantasies and the aesthetics of the respected Mr. https://civitai.com/user/rfktr/models in the images I milked as representative examples.

I'd suggest experimenting with negative prompts - in some cases you can't get a desired picture without them, and in some cases they have the opposite effect.

You can see examples of prompts in the pictures I'm sharing.

Samplers that work best with this model: DPM+SDE KARRAS, DPS FAST, DPM ADAPTIVE

meta.prompt: (ohwx) a young demon in a dark room with a creepy look on his face, close up, front view, close up, horror movie style, photography, natural light, photorealism, cinematic rendering, ray tracing, the highest quality, the highest detail, Cinematic, Third-Person View, Blur Effect, Long Exposure, 8K, Ultra-HD, Natural Lighting, Moody Lighting, Cinematic Lighting,  remix
meta.negativePrompt: lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, text, error, missing fingers, extra digit, fewer digits, cropped, worst quality, low quality, normal quality, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, blurry

meta.prompt: (ohwx) a minotaur with a horned head, highest detail, Cinematic, Blur Effect, Long Exposure, Hasselblad, Kodak color, 8K, Ultra-HD, Natural Lighting, Moody Lighting, Cinematic Lighting, <lora:gonzobugs:0.8>
meta.negativePrompt: ((extra eyes,extra head)), lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, text, error, missing fingers, extra digit, fewer digits, cropped, worst quality, low quality, normal quality, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, blurry

meta.prompt: (ohwx) a forest demon, terrifying looking, close up, photography, natural light, photorealism, cinematic rendering, ray tracing, the highest quality, the highest detail, Cinematic, Third-Person View, Blur Effect, Long Exposure, 8K, Ultra-HD, Natural Lighting, Moody Lighting, Cinematic Lighting , high key

(ohwx) a (swamp zombie) disturbing scene, close up, photography, natural light, photorealism, cinematic rendering, ray tracing, the highest quality, the highest detail, Cinematic, Third-Person View, Blur Effect, Long Exposure, 8K, Ultra-HD, Natural Lighting, Moody Lighting, Cinematic Lighting

(ohwx) a (swamp zombie), rises from the mud, disturbing scene, close up, photography, natural light, photorealism, cinematic rendering, ray tracing, the highest quality, the highest detail, Cinematic, Third-Person View, Blur Effect, Long Exposure, 8K, Ultra-HD, Natural Lighting, Moody Lighting, Cinematic Lighting , high key <lora:LORA_creepyDiffusion_v20:1>

meta.prompt: (ohwx) a demon alien, terrifying looking, close up, photography, natural light, photorealism, cinematic rendering, ray tracing, the highest quality, the highest detail, Cinematic, Third-Person View, Blur Effect, Long Exposure, 8K, Ultra-HD, Natural Lighting, Moody Lighting, Cinematic Lighting , high key
